short_summary: A competitive tendering requirement for Senior Procurement Specialist services.
description: This requirement is for Health Canada and is open to supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the following streams and categories: Stream 9.2 Procurement. The proposed period of contract shall be from February 6, 2024 to January 7, 2025. The estimated level of effort of the contract will be for 1735.50 hours.
full_summary:
================

### Tender Notice

#### Title
Temporary Help Services (THS) Requirement - 9.2 Senior Procurement Specialist

#### Reference Number
cb-520-71519727

#### Amendment Number
4

#### Solicitation Number
1000256362

#### Publication Date
2023-12-19

#### Tender Closing Date
2024-01-09 14:00:00

### Procurement Details
#### Procurement Category
Services (SRV)

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective Tendering

#### Notice Type
RFP against Supply Arrangement

#### Selection Criteria
 Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Contract Details
#### Contracting Entity
Health Canada
#### Contracting Entity Address
200 Eglantine Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K9, Canada

#### End Use Entity
None

#### Regions of Opportunity
National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contract Period
From February 6, 2024 to January 7, 2025

#### Estimated Level of Effort
1735.50 hours

#### Security Requirements
Resource(s) Minimum Security Level Required is/are: Reliability

### Important Notes
This tender is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). Only pre-qualified THS suppliers who qualify as an Indigenous business as defined under PSIB and will comply with all requirements of PSIB are eligible to submit a bid.

### Contact Information
Montana Myers,  
 Health Canada,  
200 Eglantine Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K9, Canada  
Phone: 000000000  
Email: [montana.myers@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:montana.myers@hc-sc.gc.ca)

### Attachments
Tender documents are available for download at the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

You can also download the tender description in English [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27998/1000256362-npp_en.pdf) and in French [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27998/1000256362-npp_fr.pdf).
